items.title: Why endurance events like marathons should have weight divisions for heavier runners
items.description: In sports such as wrestling, boxing, rowing, weight lifting and the martial arts, athletes are grouped by weight to make things fairer.

items.title: Labor Day mission: Build social ties through live events
items.description: If your social life has been lived out in Zoom calls since the height of the pandemic, Labor Day weekend is prime time for a reboot.

items.title: FDA now providing daily updates on adverse events
items.description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration is now providing real-time, daily publication updates on adverse event data from its reporting system.
